title: Cho Gath is not enjoyable to play against

replies.body: Cant rito just change the health provided by stoneplates ative into a shield? So you would gain a shield equal to 40% / 100% of your max health. Would have exactly the same effect but removing the stupid interaction with chigath. Cho doesnt need it. Even without it he is a very solid pick with his new E and the good cc.
Stoneshield give hp because it can be countered, kinda. By {{item:3151}} , {{item:3153}} , {{item:3036}} while some champs have in their kits to deal with high hp champs like {{champion:67}} .

Yup.  I did like this other guys idea (posted on the boards somewhere) to make it give **_base_** hp.  This would give it all the tankiness still, but prevent it from adding a bunch of damage to a certain ability.
I agree. His slows need to be trimmed down or cut out.

Thats your opinión i love play versus him. Now we play more seriuosly versus Cho... Before you only need move a bit a he didnt anything...so easy...now he is more challenger ..its very good for the game. Some people need to deal with a new champ in the meta and stop spamming cries.

For example I cant wait to see a Morde and Skarner being strong and meta... Yes we will see lots of topics like this... Its means something good.

No love I don't playing vs him... Hard very so much is to counter cho... He is slow you and with silence he knockup counterplay is none...

Cho good for not good way in meta...
He takes millennia to kill and can one shot you. Balance at it's finest. Even Godzilla is a wuss compared to Cho.

Cho is OP right now. He was better when his feast stacks didn't stack infinitely. but now he is a pain in the ass. He benefit's too much from HP scaling and he needs to become a mage-juggernaut not a fucking OP killing machine with disgusting scaling on his new E.
Honestly riot fucked up and he just is in a very unhealthy stat with that stick.
